description: ~Fox ver.08022020 - I will be adding weapons and builds, with in-depth testing and opinions. This file is meant mostly for my own use and will not necessarily reflect the most popular opinions.

//FOX

//Void Annual Skate
https://destinytracker.com/destiny-2/db/items/2145476623?perks=1294026524,1926090094,3177308360,1168162263,0,2815102891,3144544718 ~Fox: Ancient Relic in Void. Fast, solid handcannon. 
//Solar Quickfang
https://destinytracker.com/destiny-2/db/items/1180270692?perks=1713206376,3666208348,269888150,1685431615,0,3205869472,0,876331947 ~Fox: Solar element Quickfang, normally a void weapon.

//Randy's Throwing Knife
https://destinytracker.com/destiny-2/db/items/3535742959?perks=3920852688,1840239774,2420895100,247725512,1015611457,1841451179,2055287902,684616255,0,2302094943
(5) ~Fox: Fast, Stable, Long Range, short range, good damage and firerate. This stupid Scout Rifle is good for just about everything. It even has options to tweak it for personal preference. PvP PvE

//Exit Strategy
https://destinytracker.com/destiny-2/db/items/4227181568?perks=1294026524,839105230,1885400500,4071163871,3708227201,4224972855,1471333428,2942552113,0,2302094943 
(4+) ~Fox: Very solid SMG. Fast, handles well, decent damage. PvP PvE
